name: SynopsysSecurityScan
description: Run security scans on Polaris, Black Duck or Coverity platforms
author: Synopsys

inputs.name: bridge_download_url
inputs.label: Synopsys Bridge Download URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for downloading Synopsys Bridge

inputs.name: bridge_download_version
inputs.label: Synopsys Bridge Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bridge version to be downloaded.

inputs.name: synopsys_bridge_path
inputs.label: Bridge Installation Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where synopsys bridge will be configured.

inputs.name: include_diagnostics
inputs.label: Include Diagnostics
inputs.helpMarkDown: All diagnostics files will be available to download when 'true' passed.

inputs.name: scanType
inputs.label: Security Testing Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select required security testing solution

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_serverUrl
inputs.label: Polaris URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Polaris Server.

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_accessToken
inputs.label: Polaris Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access token for Polaris.

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_application_name
inputs.label: Polaris Application
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application name in Polaris.

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_project_name
inputs.label: Polaris Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in Polaris.

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_assessment_types
inputs.label: Assessment Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polaris Assessment Types seperated by commas. Click Here for more info.

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_triage
inputs.label: Polaris Triage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Polaris Triage

inputs.name: bridge_polaris_branch_name
inputs.label: Polaris Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name in Polaris.

inputs.name: polarisPRCommentSeverities
inputs.label: Polaris PR Comment Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Applicable to pull requests only

inputs.name: polarisPRCommentEnabled
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Applicable to pull requests only, Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifCreate
inputs.label: Generate SARIF Report for Polaris Issues
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable SARIF report generation.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifGroupSCAIssues
inputs.label: Group SCA Issues by Component
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this to disable grouping by component and list SCA issues by vulnerability.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifFilePath
inputs.label: Polaris SARIF Report File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path (including file name) where SARIF report is created.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifSeverities
inputs.label: Polaris SARIF Report Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issue severities to include in SARIF report. Supported values: CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW.

inputs.name: polarisReportsSarifIssueTypes
inputs.label: Polaris SARIF Report Issue Types
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issues types to include in SARIF report. Supported values: SAST,SCA.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_url
inputs.label: Coverity Platform URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Coverity platform.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_user_name
inputs.label: Coverity Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for Coverity.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_user_password
inputs.label: Coverity Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for Coverity.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_project_name
inputs.label: Coverity Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name in Coverity

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_stream_name
inputs.label: Coverity Stream
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stream name in Coverity.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_install_directory
inputs.label: Coverity Installation Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory path to install Coverity.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_connect_policy_view
inputs.label: Coverity Policy View
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name/ID number of a saved view to apply as a 'break the build' policy.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_version
inputs.label: Coverity Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Coverity Thin Client to use.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_automation_prcomment
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Applicable to pull requests only, Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: bridge_coverity_local
inputs.label: Local Scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag to enable/disable to run coverity scan locally.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_url
inputs.label: Black Duck URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL for Black Duck server.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_token
inputs.label: Black Duck Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: API token for Black Duck.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_install_directory
inputs.label: Black Duck Installation Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory path to install Black Duck.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_scan_full
inputs.label: Full Scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether full scan is required or not.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_scan_failure_severities
inputs.label: Scan Failure Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build will be broken, if specified severity threshold is met. Click Here for more info.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_automation_prcomment
inputs.label: Add Comments to Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Applicable to pull requests only, Requires Azure Token.

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_fixpr_enabled
inputs.label: Create Fix Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Flag to enable/disable the automatic fix pull request creations for Black Duck.
Default value is false

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_fixpr_useUpgradeGuidance
inputs.label: Configure Short Term or Long Term Guidance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Blackduck Hub upgrade guidance Values.Default is "SHORT_TERM, LONG_TERM"

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_fixpr_filter_severities
inputs.label: List of SEVERITIES to be filtered
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filter the vulnerabilities by given severities, Fix PR(s) will be created only for issues where the issue severity matches one of the values specified using this option Values. Default is "CRITICAL,  HIGH".

inputs.name: bridge_blackduck_fixpr_maxCount
inputs.label: Maximum number of Pull Requests to be created
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of pull requests to be created that violate policies. PR is created for each vulnerable component

inputs.name: azure_token
inputs.label: Azure Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: PAT or System.AccessToken has to be passed with legitimate access when Coverity/BlackDuck PR comment and FIX PR is enabled.
inputs.visibleRule: scanType = coverity || scanType = blackduck || scanType = polaris

inputs.name: blackduckReportsSarifCreate
inputs.label: Generate SARIF Report for Black Duck Issues
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable/disable SARIF report generation

inputs.name: blackduckReportsSarifGroupSCAIssues
inputs.label: Group SCA Issues by Component
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this to disable grouping by component and list SCA issues by vulnerability.

inputs.name: blackduckReportsSarifFilePath
inputs.label: Black Duck SARIF Report File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path (including file name) where SARIF report is created.

inputs.name: blackduckReportsSarifSeverities
inputs.label: Black Duck SARIF Report Severities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of issue severities to include in SARIF report. Supported values: CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW

inputs.name: bridge_network_airgap
inputs.label: Network Airgap
inputs.helpMarkDown: If provided, Synopsys Task will be using local network to download and execute synopsys bridge.
